Other Information

Terra Universal's Smart Desiccator maximizes yields of sensitive materials by automatically maintaining a user-determined humidity set point.

Its quick-response feedback system continuously monitors the cabinet's relative humidity level and activates a purge of dry nitrogen only when it is needed. The system economizes on gas consumption and minimizes over pressures that can stress cabinet seals.
